member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_FONT_DISABLE_POLICY
member.summary: Contains process mitigation policy settings for the loading of non-system fonts.

member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_FONT_DISABLE_POLICY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.DisableNonSystemFonts
member.summary: Set (0x1) to prevent the process from loading non-system fonts; otherwise leave unset (0x0).

member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_FONT_DISABLE_POLICY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.AuditNonSystemFontLoading
member.summary: Set (0x1) to indicate that an Event Tracing for Windows (ETW) event should be logged when the process attempts to load a non-system font; leave unset (0x0) to indicate that an ETW event should not be logged.
